```{r}
library(tidyverse)
dt <- tribble(~x, ~y, ~w, ~z,
              210, 300, 220, 180,
              102, 100, 119, 187,
              176, 175, 188, 173,
              87, 95, 91, 94, 
              202, 210, 234, 218,
              110, 122, 131, 128
)
dt

#1_a
means <- map_dbl(dt, mean)
means

#1_b
std_dev <- map_dbl(dt, sd)
std_dev

#1_c
sq_root <- map(dt, sqrt)
sq_root

#1_d
result_table <- data.frame(
  mean = colMeans(dt),
  max = apply(dt, 2, max),
  q1 = apply(dt, 2, quantile, probs = 0.25),
  median = apply(dt, 2, median),
  q3 = apply(dt, 2, quantile, probs = 0.75),
  min = apply(dt, 2, min)
)
result_table

```
